localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

This chatroom is the best way to make new friends.
Please Read Before Purchase:
-trolls will be banned
-transsexuals use this app
-discrimination/sexism will not be tolerated

Have a good time using this app.

Package size: 26 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)

(C) 2015 Tactician Studios LLC

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
